text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews COVID-19 exploding , Arizona hospitals can't even keep up with nursing staff....Trump simply does not care. People getting sick as hell and no leadership.  This is American Genocide at the hands of Donald Trump.  NO FUCKING LEADERSHIP! America needs a leader to get through this.
